mapper.insert: insert into store (name, address, client_id, sms_quantity) values (#{name}, #{address}, #{clientId}, 0);
mapper.select: select s.id, s.name, s.address, s.client_id, c.name as client_name, c.phone as client_phone, c.membership_number as client_membership_number, s.sms_quantity from store as s inner join client as c on c.id = s.client_id limit #{start}, #{pageSize};
select id, name, address, client_id, sms_quantity from store;

select s.id, s.name, s.address, s.client_id, c.name as client_name, c.phone as client_phone, c.membership_number as client_membership_number, s.sms_quantity from store as s inner join client as c on c.id = s.client_id where s.id = #{id};
